original_text: But if the rash does spread in their skin after they have shown themselves to the priest to be pronounced clean, they must appear before the priest again.
korean_text: 그러나 그가 정결한지를 제사장에게 보인 후에 병이 피부에 퍼지면 제사장에게 다시 보일 것이요

sentences.original_text: But if the rash does spread in their skin
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 만약 그들의 피부에 발진이 퍼진다면

sentences.original_text: after they have shown themselves to the priest
they must appear before the priest again
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 다시 제사장 앞에 나타나야 합니다
